title: hash.Hash doc
body:
8g version weekly.2011-12-02 10652

I couldn't work out from the doc what the new argument to Sum() means. I thought it was
a one-off input one could use instead of Write()

type Hash interface {
..
    // Sum appends the current hash in the same manner as append(), without
    // changing the underlying hash state.
    Sum(in []byte) []byte


Suggested wording:

"Sum adds the current hash to the given slice using append(), and returns the
result. The underlying hash state is not changed"
